text: Some Place Simple is the third studio album by British vocalist and songwriter Martina Topley-Bird. Recorded between 2008 and 2010, the album consists of eleven stripped-down versions of previous songs, and four new ones composed for the record. The album features contributions from Brian Burton, David Holmes, Chloe Paige, and Josh Klinghoffer. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Martina Topley-Bird - vocals, guitar *Claire Nicholson - guitar, background vocals *Brian Burton - production *Josh Klinghoffer - guitar *David Holmes - production *Jason Cox - engineering, mixing *Stephen Sedgwick - engineering, mixing ==References== Category:2010 albums Category:Martina Topley-Bird albums Category:Honest Jon's Records albums
title: Some Place Simple
